entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetDocumentationCommentXml sometimes has no root element #56733

Closed

  • dotnet build --no-resotre CSC : error CS8034 #56342
    Backlog
  • IDE0084 Use pattern matching (IsNot operator) - dangerous for "Not TypeOf..." syntax #55607
    Backlog
  • IDE0052 suggests changes that would break the desired behavior of some programs #56666
  • Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #56607
    17.0
  • Change Signature crashes if the signature is not valid #56495
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Report correct severity for Hot Reload rude edits #56734
    Area-Interactive, 17.0
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs UX Triage
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56732
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56730
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56731
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56724
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set the width of Inheritance Margin to 18 #56709
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56726
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Filter out results from progression/lsp with docs that we can't get uris for #56700
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56725
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage

Updated

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Target interactive host and tests to net6.0 #56705
    Area-Interactive
  • Improve `CSharpSyntaxFacts.IsValidIdentifier` performance #55510
    Area-IDE, Community, Area-Performance
  • Add CallerArgumentExpression to VB language feature status doc #55230
    Area-Compilers
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
